facts.fact_name: Testosterone levels among sex offenders and the general population are not meaningfully different
facts.reference: Wong, J. S., & Gravel, J. (2018). Do sex offenders have higher levels of testosterone? Results from a meta-analysis. Sexual Abuse, 30(2), 147-168.

facts.fact_name: Testosterone levels have positive, but small, relationships with pair bonding (.15), mate acquisition behavior (.21) and fatherhood (.19)
facts.reference: Grebe, N. M., Sarafin, R. E., Strenth, C. R., & Zilioli, S. (2019). Pair-bonding, fatherhood, and the role of testosterone: A meta-analytic review. Neuroscience & Biobehavioral Reviews, 98, 221-233.

facts.fact_name: Testosterone administration does not negatively affect cooperative behaviors
facts.reference: Yang, X., Wang, W., Wang, X. T., & Wang, Y. W. (2021). A meta-analysis of hormone administration effects on cooperative behaviours: Oxytocin, vasopressin, and testosterone. Neuroscience & Biobehavioral Reviews, 126, 430-443.

facts.fact_name: Soy does not feminize you nor decrease total testosterone (TT), free testosterone (FT), estradiol (E2), estrone (E1), or sex hormone binding globulin (SHBG)
facts.reference: Reed, K. E., Camargo, J., Hamilton-Reeves, J., Kurzer, M., & Messina, M. (2021). Neither soy nor isoflavone intake affects male reproductive hormones: An expanded and updated meta-analysis of clinical studies. Reproductive Toxicology, 100, 60-67.

facts.fact_name: Testosterone and cortisol do not have any meaningful association with status, dominance, risk-taking, aggression, nor psychopathy
facts.reference: Dekkers, T. J., van Rentergem, J. A. A., Meijer, B., Popma, A., Wagemaker, E., & Huizenga, H. M. (2019). A meta-analytical evaluation of the dual-hormone hypothesis: Does cortisol moderate the relationship between testosterone and status, dominance, risk taking, aggression, and psychopathy?. Neuroscience & Biobehavioral Reviews, 96, 250-271

facts.fact_name: Testosterone and cortisol do not have any meaningful association with personality: openness, conscientiousness, extraversion, agreeableness, and neuroticism
facts.reference: Sundin, Z. W., Chopik, W. J., Welker, K. M., Ascigil, E., Brandes, C. M., Chin, K., … & Tackett, J. L. (2021). Estimating the associations between big five personality traits, testosterone, and cortisol. Adaptive Human Behavior and Physiology, 7(3), 307-340.

facts.fact_name: Anabolic-androgenic steroid (AAS) use administration was associated with only a small increase in self-reported aggression and no increase in observer-reported aggression
facts.reference: Chegeni, R., Pallesen, S., McVeigh, J., & Sagoe, D. (2021). Anabolic-androgenic steroid administration increases self-reported aggression in healthy males: a systematic review and meta-analysis of experimental studies. Psychopharmacology, 238(7), 1911-1922.
table: Self-reported (random-effects) AAS administered over longer periods
Self-reported (fixed-effects) AAS administered in high dose (over 500 mg)

facts.fact_name: Testosterone has no relationship with mating success, measured by sexual partners within the last twelve months, lifetime sexual partners and lifetime number of one-night stands.
facts.reference: Kordsmeyer, T. L., Hunt, J., Puts, D. A., Ostner, J., & Penke, L. (2018). The relative importance of intra-and intersexual selection on human male sexually dimorphic traits. Evolution and Human Behavior, 39(4), 424-436.

facts.fact_name: Testosterone and cortisol do not affect facial attractiveness, facial dominance, facial health
facts.reference: Kordsmeyer, T. L., Lohöfener, M., & Penke, L. (2019). Male facial attractiveness, dominance, and health and the interaction between cortisol and testosterone. Adaptive Human Behavior and Physiology, 5(1), 1-12.

facts.fact_name: High intensity exercise produces acute increases in testosterone, but returns to baseline one hour following activity
facts.reference: D’andrea, S., Spaggiari, G., Barbonetti, A., & Santi, D. (2020). Endogenous transient doping: physical exercise acutely increases testosterone levels—results from a meta-analysis. Journal of endocrinological investigation, 43(10), 1349-1371.

facts.fact_name: Church attendance is associated with higher educational attainment among Christians
Eating locally does not meaningfully reduce your carbon footprint

Eating organic food requires more land, cause more eutrophication (harmful algal blooms), have more acidification potential, and emit the same amount of greenhouse gas emissions as conventional systems (but use a smaller, similar amount energy)
facts.reference: Clark, M., & Tilman, D. (2017). Comparative analysis of environmental impacts of agricultural production systems, agricultural input efficiency, and food choice. Environmental Research Letters, 12, 064016.

facts.fact_name: Grass-fed beef produces more greenhouse gas emissions, uses more land, and causes more eutrophication than grain-fed beef
facts.reference: Clark, M., & Tilman, D. (2017). Comparative analysis of environmental impacts of agricultural production systems, agricultural input efficiency, and food choice. Environmental Research Letters, 12, 064016.

facts.fact_name: The most impactful ways to reduce your carbon footprint are: having one fewer child, living car-free (or adjacent behavior), avoiding airplane travel, and eating a plant-based diet
facts.reference: Seth Wynes and Kimberly A Nicholas (2017) The climate mitigation gap: education and government recommendations miss the most effective individual actions. Environ. Res. Lett. 12 074024

facts.fact_name: The simple grocery bag is the most environmentally friendly bag option for the environment, especially compared to paper bags
reference: Danish Environmental Protection Agency. (2018). Life Cycle Assessment of grocery carrier bags. Environmental Project no. 1985, February 2018. Retrieved from https://web.archive.org/web/20240312013317/https://www2.mst.dk/udgiv/publications/2018/02/978-87-93614-73-4.pdf

Boustead Consulting & Associates. (2018). Life Cycle Assessment for Three Types of Grocery Bags. Progressive Bag Alliance. Retrieved from /mnt/data/Life-Cycle-Assessment-for-Three-Types-of-Grocery-Bags.pdf

facts.fact_name: Doubling the population density increases CO2 efficiency typically by 42%
facts.reference: Ramana Gudipudi, Till Fluschnik, Anselmo García Cantú Ros, Carsten Walther, Jürgen P. Kropp, City density and CO2 efficiency, Energy Policy, Volume 91

facts.fact_name: Nuclear and Solar power are the safest and cleanest energy sources per watt of electricity generated
facts.reference: Hannah Ritchie (2020) - “What are the safest and cleanest sources of energy?” Published online at OurWorldInData.org. Retrieved from: 'https://ourworldindata.org/safest-sources-of-energy' [Online Resource]

facts.fact_name: University graduates are two to five times as likely to hold a degree in the field that their parents graduated from
facts.reference: Altmejd, Adam, Inheritance of Fields of Study (2024). CESifo Working Paper No. 11113, Available at SSRN: https://ssrn.com/abstract=4827105 or http://dx.doi.org/10.2139/ssrn.4827105

facts.fact_name: Increased education has no effect long-term on brain-strucutre
facts.reference: Nicholas Judd, Rogier Kievit, No effect of additional education on long-term brain structure: a preregistered natural experiment in over 30,000 individuals. bioRxiv 2024.05.17.594682
